biotools.summary: Identification of single nucleotide variants using position-specific error estimation in deep sequencing data | Targeted deep sequencing is a highly effective technology to identify known and novel single nucleotide variants (SNVs) with many applications in translational medicine, disease monitoring and cancer profiling
